parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 1.72

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Loadouts

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get array of compatible pylon magazines

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> vehicle '''getCompatiblePylonMagazines''' pylon

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - aircraft object
</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> pylon: [[Number]] - pylon id or [[String]] - pylon class name from <tt>TransportPylonsComponent &gt;&gt; pylons</tt> class (see Example 4). 0 or "" to return all compatible magazines from all pylons

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> vehicleClass '''getCompatiblePylonMagazines''' pylon

</value></part><part><name>p21 </name>=<value> vehicleClass: [[String]] - aircraft config class
</value></part><part><name>p22 </name>=<value> pylon: [[Number]] - pylon id or [[String]] - pylon class name from </value></part><part><name index="4"/><value><tt>TransportPylonsComponent &gt;&gt; pylons</tt> class (see Example 4). 0 or "" to return all compatible magazines from all pylons

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] 0; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns array of arrays containing all compatible magazines</value></part></template></code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>"Plane_Fighter_01_Base_F" [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] 3; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns array of compatible magazines for the 3rd pylon</value></part></template></code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>jet1 [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] "pylon1"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns array of compatible magazines for the 1st pylon</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Vehicle Loadouts]],[[getPylonMagazines]],[[setAmmoOnPylon]],[[ammoOnPylon]],[[animatePylon]],[[animateBay]],[[setPylonsPriority]],[[setPylonLoadout]]
</value></part></template></root>
